sentence: My kids whom the staff greeted by name after I had called prior to arrival letting them know we were celebrating something received gifts upon check in a balloon for my son special robes and kids toiletries in the room
Topping off the stay I mentioned it was my birthday on check in and they left cake with candles in the room
Even with sub zero wind chills we were positioned ideally to bundle up and venture from our hotel room out into the elements
great location room was emacuye and spacious with a great view from the 29th floor
The staff offered complimentary treats for our kids in the room and a prize at check in
We were in a corner executive suite which was spacious and beautiful
After I moved I stayed in a suite to die for
The staff is wonderful I came down with a cold and they put four extra boxes of Kleenex in my room
Room and service were fantastic water took a while to warm up
Nice big rooms w a great view of the city and lake
My husband and I are arriving in a few days and I felt like upgrading our room due to the our anniversary business meeting
Nice rooms no mini bar expensive room service dated lobby
The bedroom I stayed in was ok but again needed updating
Rooms should be better apointed for a 5 star hotel
No coffee in hotel or rooms
Firstly no information about the hotel in the guest room
First one should know that arrival is not like the typical in that you pull in on street level and then go up to the 12th floor for check in and then up another elevator to your room
The AG bed was not in the room all set up as promised
first as other reviewers have pointed out the decor furnishings etc is tired scuffed furniture carpet showing wear etc
The room was not ready by 4 pm

Bath shower was poorly designed water on the floor showerhead with few settings shower tub drain easy to accidentally close Room designers should spend a little less time on looks a little more time on functionality
There was also an erroneous minibar charge on our itemized receipt which was taken off with no hassle during checkout

Finding the check in desk was a tiny bit confusing since it was at the complete opposite end of the room to the elevators and there were directions to multiple other places like the room elevators the bar gym restaurant etc
